page.title: 05CHILDREN'S CLOTHES.
page.content: Everyday clothes for girls under 11 are usually a skirt and jumper or a dress. Some girls wear uniform to school but we don't. Sports shoes are very popular and we call them trainers. To play in, girls wear shorts and t-shirts or a track suit. For best wear, girls have pretty dresses, fashionable ankle-socks and leather sandals. Some girls wear luminous socks! Young boys wear long trousers or denim jeans, a t-shirt and jumper, short socks and trainers. The most popular outer clothing is a nylon anorak. Sometimes boys wear body warmers which are sleeveless jackets. Zip fasteners are very fashionable. Boys and girls wear brief underpants and sometimes vests as well. Girls also wear pretty petticoats.
